entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
